participant_abstract.sent: The group has become coherent and interactive.
There is a willingness to cooperate.
Decisions are made in a colleagiate way.

participant_decisions.sent: Market trend: Fruit and vegetable, spongy.
Fancy, elegant more than technologically innovative more than easy to use.
Technical: use plastic with rubber casing, powered by kenetic energy, No decision on curvatures, look like scroll but puch button technology, Separate fashionable covers could be separate product.
Yellow with black buttons with company slogan and image suggested.

participant_problems.sent: Conflict of ideas with cost constraints.
